attributes.additional_details:
I am collecting signatures to support my appeal to allow me to live on my land and run a smallholding.

The business I am proposing uses only renewable energy and focuses on high animal welfare.

I am producing meat, eggs and vegetables to meet the growing demand for high quality, local food.

I genuinely care about our environment, this venture is fully sustainable and supported by the local community and the Parish Council.

As advocated by the Government this business is green and sustainable and needs your support.

To view the original planning application please refer to the West Berks website ref 12/00621/FULD
